suite.name: Ads

test.name: Deve cadastrar um anúncio com sucesso

kw.name: Begin Web Test
New Browser
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": false, "chromiumSandbox": false, "devtools": false, "handleSIGHUP": true, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "slowMo": 0.0, "timeout": 30000.0, "tracesDir": "/Users/keziamessias/Downloads/bikeboard-robot/browser/traces/temp/d209d52e-1ad8-45dc-9cc2-8d0a1e925c9a"}
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.

kw.name: New Page
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: http://localhost:3000
kw.doc: Open a new Page.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
Navega para a página inicial e verifica o título.

kw.name: Ad Creation Mock
kw.doc: TODO: Add rfdoc string to exposed function to create documentation

kw.name: Click Advertise Link
Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector h3 >> text=Anunciar Bicicleta at state visible
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
Clica no link para anunciar e verifica se a página correta foi carregada.

kw.name: Fill Ad Form
Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Caloi Cross 1994 - clássica e conservada' in the given field.
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Relíquia dos anos 90! Bicicleta Caloi Cross original, toda revisada e em excelente estado. Pneus novos, pintura retrô preservada e selim original da época. Ideal para colecionadores e fãs de bikes vintage.' in the given field.
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Select Options By
kw.msg: Selects the option(s) Caloi by attribute SelectAttribute.label from element select.
kw.doc: Selects options from select element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Cross Aro 20' in the given field.
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text '1800' in the given field.
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text '1994' in the given field.
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Fernando Papito' in the given field.
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.msg: Fills the text '11930091001' in the given field.
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
Preenche o formulário de anúncio com os dados fornecidos.

kw.name: Submit Ad Form
Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.
Clica no botão para submeter o formulário de anúncio.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector h3 >> text=Anúncio Enviado com Sucesso! at state visible
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector text=Obrigado por escolher o BikeBoard para anunciar sua bicicleta at state visible
kw.arg: text=Obrigado por escolher o BikeBoard para anunciar sua bicicleta
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector text=Seu anúncio foi enviado para nossa equipe de moderação at state visible
kw.arg: text=Seu anúncio foi enviado para nossa equipe de moderação
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: End Web Test
Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.

kw.name: Close Context
kw.msg: Switching context to CURRENT in CURRENT
kw.doc: Closes a Context.
Executado ao final de cada teste para tirar screenshot e salvar o vídeo.
